testcase.name: Edit Career Profile
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to Naukri Application......................................passed And Enter the credentials...................................................passed When I navigate to my profile...............................................passed And Click on career profile.................................................passed And I click on "preferred location", select/deselect a "location"...........passed And Click on save button....................................................passed Then I should see profile updated as "Today"................................passed

testcase.name: Update Resume
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to Naukri Application......................................passed And Enter the credentials...................................................passed When I navigate to my profile...............................................passed And Click on update in resume...............................................passed And I click on resume that has to be uploaded...............................passed Then Resume should be uploaded successfully.................................passed And I should see profile updated as "Today".................................passed
